Mukhina, T. I. 2021. Recent data on soil nematodes of the families Teratocephalidae and Metateratocephalidae from Primorsky Region, Russia.

Journal Article: Mukhina, T. I. 2021. Recent data on soil nematodes of the families Teratocephalidae and Metateratocephalidae from Primorsky Region, Russia. Amurian Zoological Journal 13(3): 410-417.
